summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in Block Three (3) of Boren & Denny's Addition to the City of Seattle (same being the alley between Second Avenue and Third Avenue, from Cherry Street to James Street), by grading and paving the same with vitrified brick, laid upon a proper concrete foundation, in accordance with Majority Petition, being File No. 30665, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Immediate Payment," under the provisions of Ordinance No. 5693 of said city, approved December 6, 1899.
